com.ephesoft.dcma.user.service

Interface UserConnectivityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserConnectivityServiceImpl

    public interface UserConnectivityService
    This class provides the set of groups and users in accordance to the value provided in user.connection in the user-connectivity.properties file.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
